title: amba ninnu nammiti
sahitya:
amba ninnu nammiti nanTE nI kanumAna mEmamma?   
(amba)

anupallavi

shambaravairijanaka sOdari sharaNu jocci manasAra shrI
jaga   
(damba)

caraNam 1

gIrvANa ganAdhAri! amba sharvAni yakhandAkAri!
parvatarAja manojnya kumAri! nirvAhamu lEka madini
kOri   
(amba)

caraNam 2

suravairi kadana shauryE! varuNAlaya samagAmbhIryE
svarajita
kOkila rava mAdhuryE paritApamu tALakanu sucaryE!
(amba)

caraNam 3

sharmadAyaki gauri duSkarma kaluSa vanakuThAri!
nirmala
tyAgarAja hrccAri! dharma samvardhani OmkAri  
(amba)
